import React,{useRef} from 'react' import classes from './Checkout.module.css' const Checkout = (props) => { const nameInputRef=useRef() const streetInputRef=useRef() const postalInputRef=useRef() const cityInputRef=useRef() const ConfirmHandler=(event)=> { event.preventDefault() nameInputRef.current.value } return (
); } export default Checkout
